title: In App purchase Hack
content: I have downloaded kaspersky internet security from the playstore and it asks for free version or trial version and i have given trial version then i got 7 days free pack,After that i used with the help of lucky patcher and freedom app i can able to byepass without money i can able to purchase 365 days pack ,Hope this will help ,I have attached screenshot here kindly check,I dint spend not even single $
weaknesses: Use of a Key Past its Expiration Date
steps: Download Kaspersky Internet Security from the Play Store and select the trial version to get a 7-day free pack.
Use Lucky Patcher and Freedom app to bypass payment and purchase the 365-day pack without spending any money.
vuln_description: The vulnerability allows users to bypass in-app purchases for Kaspersky Internet Security using third-party tools like Lucky Patcher and Freedom app, enabling them to unlock premium features without payment.
reason: The attack involves using readily available third-party tools to manipulate the app's payment verification process, which is a common and well-documented method for bypassing in-app purchases. The steps are straightforward and do not require deep understanding of the app's internal logic or complex interactions between components.
